Interactive Components

Tabs

Snap is the LLM-native web framework. Describe your website, get beautiful HTML.

Just create a .snap file and run: node cli.js dev

Write components using indent-based nesting. Style with keywords. Ship instantly.

Accordion

What is Snap?

Snap is a web framework where you describe what you want instead of coding it. An LLM can generate a full page in ~30 tokens.

How does it work?

You write .snap files using a simple DSL. The compiler converts them to optimized HTML + CSS + JS. No build tools needed.

Is it production ready?

It's v0.2 â€” great for landing pages, portfolios, docs, and static sites. Full app capabilities coming in v0.5.

    Timeline

  • v0.1 â€” Core Framework

    Parser, compiler, dev server, CLI. 30+ components, file-based routing.

  • v0.2 â€” Interactive & Themed

    Tabs, modals, accordions, animations, theming, variables, SEO, 40+ components.

  • v0.3 â€” LLM Optimization

    SNAP_SPEC.md, 100+ examples, shorthand syntax, page templates.

  • v1.0 â€” Production Ready

    State management, API integration, deployment, ecosystem.
